Crime, Famines, Pestilence 

     Satan is working in the atmosphere; he is poisoning the atmosphere, and here we are dependent upon God for our lives--our present and eternal lives. And being in the position that we are, we need to be wide awake, wholly devoted, wholly converted, wholly consecrated 
                                                                           27
to God. But we seem to sit as though we were paralyzed. God of heaven, wake us up!--2SM 52 (1890).
